comment: Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, Racist comments are hurtful and unwanted. Please refrain from using them and consider other people’s feelings. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :ARG0 (r / racist)))
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 c)
            :mod (h2 / hey
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (r2 / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 c))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :mod (o / other)))))
      :snt3 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))

comment: Please do not use racist language. It is not acceptable.
amr:
# ::snt Please do not use racist language. It is not acceptable.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (l / language
                  :mod (r / racist)))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a / accept-01
                  :ARG1 (ii / it))))

comment: Please do not use derogatory racial and ethnic slurs.
